attributes.action: Review Speeding fines in line with the risk of real injury to pedestrians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a fine only non penalty point speeding system for any transgression of 10mph or less over the speed limit for limits 40mph and above. For 20 or 30mph zones then 4 points and £200 automatic penalty for exceeding those limits by 10% or more.
